name: pull_request_reactions
description: Tracks the number of reactions on pull requests, allowing users to query reactions for specific pull requests.

dimensions.name: number
dimensions.description: The unique number identifying the pull request.

dimensions.name: author__login
dimensions.description: The login of the user who authored the pull request.

dimensions.name: created_at
dimensions.description: The timestamp when the pull request was created.

measures.name: reaction_count
measures.description: The total number of reactions on a pull request.

sample_questions: How many reactions did PR 67 get?
What is the total number of reactions on pull request number 123?
sql_to_underlying_datasource: SELECT pull_requests.number, pull_requests.author__login, pull_requests.created_at, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM issues.issues__reactions WHERE _dlt_parent_id = pull_requests.number) as reaction_count FROM pull_requests
